#summary How to install SNEE and get it running.

= Getting Started =

This page explains how to install SNEE and get it running, and is aimed at mainly at users.

Note that SNEE developers are directed to the [Installing_Developer_Environment instructions for SNEE developers].

===Get the code===

Download the latest release from the [http://code.google.com/p/snee/downloads/list downloads section], and unzip it to the directory of your choice.
